title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 113 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 113 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Praise ye the LORD. Praise, O ye servants of the LORD, praise the name of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华。耶和华的仆人哪，你们要赞美，赞美耶和华的名。

lineList.en: Blessed be the name of the LORD from this time forth and for evermore.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的名，是应当称颂的，从今时直到永远。

lineList.en: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same the LORD's name is to be praised.
lineList.cn: 从日出之地，到日落之处，耶和华的名是应当赞美的。

lineList.en: The LORD is high above all nations, and his glory above the heavens.
lineList.cn: 耶和华超乎万民之上。他的荣耀高过诸天。

lineList.en: Who is like unto the LORD our God, who dwelleth on high,
lineList.cn: 谁像耶和华我们的神呢。他坐在至高之处，

lineList.en: Who humbleth himself to behold the things that are in heaven, and in the earth!
lineList.cn: 自己谦卑，观看天上地下的事。

lineList.en: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, and lifteth the needy out of the dunghill;
lineList.cn: 他从灰尘里抬举贫寒人，从粪堆中提拔穷乏人。

lineList.en: That he may set him with princes, even with the princes of his people.
lineList.cn: 使他们与王子同坐，就是与本国的王子同坐。

lineList.en: He maketh the barren woman to keep house, and to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 他使不能生育的妇人安居家中，为多子的乐母。你们要赞美耶和华。
